mapper.insert: insert into userInfo ( id, birthday, addr, sign, idCard, phone, college, roleId, name, pwd, gender, classId, deptId, createTime ) values ( seq_for_userInfo.nextval, #{obj.birthday}, #{obj.addr}, #{obj.sign}, #{obj.idCard}, #{obj.phone}, #{obj.college}, #{obj.roleId}, #{obj.name}, #{obj.pwd}, #{obj.gender}, #{obj.classId}, #{obj.deptId}, sysdate )
mapper.update: update userInfo set pwd = #{user.pwd}, phone = #{user.phone}, sign = #{user.sign}, idCard = #{user.idCard}, birthday = #{user.birthday} where id = #{user.id}
mapper.select: select * from (select u.*,rownum rn from (select a.id,a.college,a.phone,a.gender,a.name,b.name className,c.name deptName from userInfo a,classInfo b,deptInfo c where a.classId=b.id and a.deptId=c.id) u where #{end} >= rownum) where rn > #{start}
